citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:40 am on
07-Nov-16.
Inspector knocked on the front door and rang the doorbell. Attempted to contact licensee by phone and left a
message. Departed facility at 11:11 am.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:40 am on
07-Nov-16.
Inspector knocked on the front door and rang the doorbell.  Attempted to contact licensee by phone and left a
message. Departed facility at 11:11 am.
